name: Chronophobia (antinootus)
description:
A 3-minute narrative horror experience about identity, anxiety, and running out of time. I regrettably made this in like one day. 

NOTE: Game will launch in full screen to prevent arrow keys from scrolling the page!

CONTENT WARNING: Suicide

CONTROLS

Arrow keys - move

Spacebar - interact

CREDITS

Made in Construct 3. Design and visual assets made by me.

MUSIC

"(Free) Horror Ambiance" - ESN Productions on YouTube

“Mental Plunder” - Naoya Sakamata on Soundcloud

“When We’re Sitting Watching The Planes, Burn Up Through The Night Like Meteorites” - Salakapakka Sound System vs. The Day of the Antler on Chosic

SOUND EFFECTS

Picking up paper sound effect - scholzi982 on freesound.org

Door opening sound effect - LittleRobotSoundFactory on freesound.org
